name: Easy Everyday Sandwich bread
description: How to make Vegan Everyday Sandwich Bread Loaf. Dairy-free nut-free soy-free Yeast Bread.  Makes a 8.5 by 4.5 medium loaf
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups whole wheat flour (I use Bob's Red Mill)
1 Tablespoons extra virgin olive oil (or virgin coconut oil)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add 2 Tablespoons warm water, 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast. Mix and let sit until frothy(10 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add 2 Tablespoons warm water, 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast. Mix and let sit until frothy(10 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt to the 1.5 cups wheat flour and mix. Add wheat flour and 1 cup bread flour to the yeast mix,
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt to the 1.5 cups wheat flour and mix. Add wheat flour and 1 cup bread flour to the yeast mix,

recipeInstructions.text: Add agave, oil, rest of the water and knead 6-8 minutes in stand mixer or 8-10 minutes by hand.
recipeInstructions.name: Add agave, oil, rest of the water and knead 6-8 minutes in stand mixer or 8-10 minutes by hand.

recipeInstructions.text: If the dough is sticky, then add a little bread flour until the the dough is soft and almost not sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: If the dough is sticky, then add a little bread flour until the the dough is soft and almost not sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well greased container. Cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well greased container. Cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down, use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to help make the dough less sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down, use a Tablespoon or so bread flour to help make the dough less sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Pull a bit on all sides and tuck under to get a taut top. Place the tucked side down on parchment lined or well greased bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Pull a bit on all sides and tuck under to get a taut top. Place the tucked side down on parchment lined or well greased bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water liberally on top, then sprinkle some flour or oats on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water liberally on top, then sprinkle some flour or oats on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with towel and let rise for 45 minutes or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with towel and let rise for 45 minutes or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes, or until a tap on he top sounds hollow.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 365 degrees F for 35-40 minutes, or until a tap on he top sounds hollow.

keywords: vegan bread recipe, vegan sandwich bread, yeast bread
